name: express-dependency-injection
description: a dependency injector for express using decorators

scripts.localCoverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "src/**/*.spec.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.spec.ts && nyc report --reporter lcov
scripts.coverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "src/**/*.spec.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.spec.ts && nyc report --reporter text-lcov | coveralls

author: Ndy0
